title: A game question, unrelated to League.
body: This is gonna be strange, but does anyone know of any recent games that are like Final Fantasy X or XII that you can get on PC? Just on Steam or whatever. I only own PC now and I've really started to miss those games as of late for some reason. lmao

replies.body: Unless your willing to go to the earlier games that are on Steam (look up FF 7/8) then you'll have to settle for an emulator for them and hope your PC's specs are high enough to run them.

An emulator is a program that emulates a console's (this is most console's that exist can currently be emulated, though some of them require massive specs from your computer) gaming software so that you can run games from that console

Basically makes a console game work on a PC.
I'm pretty sure my laptop is strong enough to run most things. Thank you so much man, where can I find one for PS2?
